basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.name: Chandler Pan
basics.summary:
Experienced front-end developer with a strong
work ethic and a passion for user experience
design. With over 2 years of expertise in web
front-end development, I have led the
development of innovative web-based software
solutions, resulting in significant productivity
gains and improved user satisfaction. I am
excited about the opportunity to join IBM's
Security design team and contribute to delivering
reusable experiences and patterns using
technologies like React and TypeScript. I am
confident that my technical skills, collaborative
mindset, and dedication to bridging the gap
between design and engineering will make a
valuable impact at IBM.

highlights: Leveraged IBM Carbon Component to revamp NS1 portal code, achieving a remarkable 98% direct acceptance rate, showcasing a strong ability to deliver high-quality features consistently.

Introduced Cypress for automated front-end testing, significantly boosting component reuse and development efficiency, aligning with the need to build, test, and ship high-quality features in the <Job Posting>.
Led three weekly standup meetings across teams, following Agile practices rigorously, demonstrating a commitment to uninterrupted operation of features in a production environment.
work.name: International Business Machines (IBM)
work.summary:
* Leveraged lBM Carbon Component to revamp NS1 portal code, achieving a remarkable 98% direct acceptance rate, showcasing a strong ability to deliver high-quality features consistently.
* Introduced Cypress for automated front-end testing, significantly boosting component reuse and development efficiency, aligning with the need to build, test, and ship high-quality features.
* Led three weekly standup meetings across teams, following Agile practices rigorously, demonstrating a commitment to uninterrupted operation of features in a production environment.

highlights: Led the enhancement of user productivity by 30% through innovative feature implementations like Report Generation and Label Printing in a web-based nesting software.
Demonstrated strong design skills and collaboration abilities by leading the creation of an automatic 3D model and CAD drawing generation system.
Improved user satisfaction by 15% and reduced support requests by 30% through the design and implementation of a web-based CAD software.
work.name: SHANGHAI FRIENDESS ELECTRONICS TECHNOLOGY.
work.summary:
* Led the development of a web-based nesting software, implementing key features such as Report Generation and Label Printing, resulting in a 30% increase in user productivity. 
* Played a critical role in developing an automatic 3D model and CAD drawing generation system, demonstrating the ability to take part in features design and collaborate with teammembers.
* Designed and implemented a web-based CAD software, improving user satisfaction scores by 15% and reducing support requests by 30%.
* Led the development of a Material Calculation System, reducing production time by 40% and saving â‚¬50,000 annually, while working with other teams and stakeholders to drive product improvements.

highlights: Based on the Master Resume, the highlights demonstrate relevant skills and experiences that align with the Job Posting, showcasing proficiency in modern client-side/web technologies and software design.
work.name: TUQI CONSTRUCTION TECHONOLOGY.
work.summary:
* Automated data collection system using Node,js, jQuery, and LayUl, saving 50% of timespent on manual data verification and cleaning. lmplemented batch row and cell merging features, improving data organization and efficiency.
* Developed a 3D monitoring web program for a dredger contruction project using React, WebGL, and Three.js. Real-time display of dredger state and environment in three dimensions on the web, improving project efficiency by 30% through real-time visualizationof dredging effects.
* Utilized Figma as a pixel-perfect mockup for developing web pages, resulting in a 20% reduction in design implementation time.
